item.title: Auto-tracing

item.title: Rädda gräsmatta i nöd
item.description: Torka, blöta vintrar, mossinvasion och hårda fotbollsdrabbningar – en gräsmatta lider ofta i det tysta. Här kommer råden som gör den trötta gräsmattan ung och grön på nytt! Gå till wexthuset.com för att läsa mer om andra intressanta områden

item.title: Appar
item.description: Pango Musical March (35 kronor) Pango Musical March är en lekfull app som låter barn skapa musik med hjälp av en parad med diverse färgglada figurer.

item.title: Gardening for the mind
item.description: See your mind as a garden full of different ideas, or lack thereof.

item.title: Focused learning with personal projects
item.description: By just consuming information and content without doing anything more with it, you can’t really grok the information on a deeper level.

item.title: Compound AI System
item.description: While LLMs appear to follow remarkable scaling laws that predictably yield better results with more compute, in many applications, scaling offers lower returns-vs-cost than building a compound system.

item.title: Atomic Notes
item.description: Atomic notes are to be made of a single idea or concept and no other reference is needed to understand this kind of note.

item.title: AI team assistants
item.description: A lot of frameworks and tools mainly focus on the individual contributor, focusing on creating a 10x developer.
